title: Flipped Learning-Based Training Program for Enhancing Information Literacy (Self-Directed)

context.prior_knowledge: Basic experience in academic literature search
context.additional_context: Program to strengthen information evaluation and utilization skills applicable to students across diverse disciplines (science, social sciences, humanities)

learning_goals: Students can independently search for and select credible materials from academic databases.
Students can critically analyze academic resources by applying a 5-step framework for evaluating source reliability.
Students can develop information-sharing and academic communication strategies through collaborative learning activities.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
